p.d: A young actress dies at the end of a performance of "Romeo and Juliet": poisoned, just like the heroine she played. Déa and Matthieu investigate at a theatre school that seems to have garnered every possible human failing. Including crime? Directed by: Akim Isker (France, 2019) Screenplay: Camille Pouzol, Hélene Duchateau Cast: Carole Weyers (Déa Versini), François Vincentelli (Jimmy), Ambroise Michel (Matthieu Delcourt), Bruno Gouery (Fred Jolin), Fleur Geffrier (Jeanne Granger), Pierre Laplace (Xavier Fremont), Bastien Bernini (Damien), François Dunoyer (Massimo Versini), Stéphane Guillon (Franz Shuster) Genre: detective Awards: best actress (Carole Weyers), 2019 Séries Mania festival
